title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 481.7 - How payments are applied
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 481.7 - How payments are applied

State Regulations

The department will apply a person's payment of an annual
program fee to the earliest program fee due at the time of payment and to any
interest and penalty attributable to that fee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
481.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
